name: Alice Labs Pte. Ltd.
description:
Introducing MyAlice, a workspace to manage all your WhatsApp conversations, sales, and marketing to turn you and your team into revenue champions. You can also connect Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Viber, Line, and Telegram to keep all your customers active and make them come back.

No more switching tabs to respond to WhatsApp, Live Chat, Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Line, Telegram, and Viber. Centralize all your customer interactions, take or update orders, and schedule promotional campaigns under one workspace.
focus_areas: Marketing - Reach out to customers where their friends are for higher CTRs and engagement. Create WhatsApp audience and schedule campaigns.
Sales - When customers come to your store intending to buy something, place or update the order for him while chatting with a single click.
Support - Collaborate between multiple agents to reply to your customers from a team collaboration inbox. All agents are on the same number.
